aWLI_StateProvision.content: {\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1036{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil MS Sans Serif;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 MS Sans Serif;}{\f2\fnil\fcharset2 Symbol;}} {\colortbl ;\red0\green0\blue0;} {\*\generator Msftedit 5.41.21.2509;}\viewkind4\uc1\pard\cf1\f0\fs16 Beginning at age 65, your life coverage is reduced based on the benefit amount in force on your 64th birthday.\par \par \b\f1 Age - Reduction of coverage\par \pard{\pntext\f2\'B7\tab}{\*\pn\pnlvlblt\pnf2\pnindent0{\pntxtb\'B7}}\li720\b0 63 : 35%\f0\par \f1{\pntext\f2\'B7\tab}70 : 55%\f0\par \f1{\pntext\f2\'B7\tab}75 : 70%\f0\par \f1{\pntext\f2\'B7\tab}80 : 80%\f0\par \f1{\pntext\f2\'B7\tab}85 : 85%\f0\par \pard\li720\par }
aWLI_StateProvision.Title: Standard Age Reduction Schedule
